titles: A discourse of life and death: written in French, by Phil. Mornay. Done in English by the Countesse of Pembroke
Excellent discours de la vie et de la mort. English
author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
Pembroke, Mary Sidney Herbert, Countess of, 1561-1621.
publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Mathew Lownes, and are to bee soulde at his shop in Paules Churchyard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
